title: Any idea on how to activate office 365 using pesu microsoft teams email?
content: So basically I tried signing in to office.com using the pesu teams Id and it said office 365 is active on this email. However I'm not able to sign in to the apps (ex. Word, excel,etc) individually on my computer. What am I supposed to do ?

comments.body: I believe its active only for the online (in browser) version of office
